com.abiquo.abicloud.model
Class VirtualSystemModel

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      com.abiquo.abicloud.model.VirtualSystemModel

public class VirtualSystemModel
extends java.util.Observable

The Class VirtualSystemModel represents a mini model to maintain a list of virtual systems.

createVirtualMachine

public AbsVirtualMachine createVirtualMachine(java.lang.String type,

                                              VirtualMachineConfiguration config)
                                       throws VirtualMachineException

the abs virtual machine
Throws:
